context: Analyze this plank variation pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Four-Limbed Staff (Chaturanga Dandasana) Low push-up position with elbows close to body. Consider the Upper body strength, core stability, alignment. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Low push-up position with elbows close to body
practitioner.primaryFocus: Upper body strength, core stability, alignment
